bucket_descriptions.compulsive_night_scroller: High-urgency segment with strong need for immediate reduction in problematic scrolling.

personas.name: Noah Allen
personas.relevant_history: Usage regularly causes sleep loss and next-day performance decline.
personas.in_their_voice: I need this to work now because my sleep and performance are slipping.

personas.name: Emma Baker
personas.relevant_history: Prior attempts at blockers and deletion failed during high-stress windows.
personas.in_their_voice: I cannot keep relying on willpower at night.

personas.name: Liam Chen
personas.relevant_history: Reports recurring late-night spirals that disrupt deadlines and routines.

personas.name: Olivia Allen
personas.relevant_history: Needs immediate harm-reduction, not just incremental optimization.
personas.in_their_voice: If it only works when I feel good, it will fail for me.
